title: Magic Warrior White・Love! - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Comedy   Ecchi   School Life   Seinen   Supernatural
tags: Corruption   Magical Girls   Monsters   Netorare   R-18
author: Makafushigi-man   摩訶不思議マン
description:
Shiroyama Nagisa is the heroine of justice! As the magical warrior White・Love, she fights the organization Ever・Darkness to keep evil at bay!

Mihara Takuya, the hero(?) of this story, is the boyfriend of such a beautiful and noble girl. Although he is happy to be her lover, he continues to train every day to become a man who can protect his precious girlfriend. 

But will everything be okay? The men in the world aren’t so kind as to leave Nagisa’s body alone! Takuya’s father, classmates at school, the neighbourhood brats, evil monsters, etc…

Whenever there’s a chance, men try to take advantage of Nagisa. Will Nagisa be able to keep her love for Takuya alive? Will Takuya be able to protect Nagisa from other men?

Now the trial of love begins...>
